info.author: Sophie Friedl
info.description: removes read pairs from sam/bam files created by bwa sampe
info.paperDescription: We removed read pairs with unmapped reads/ improper pair classification/ low mapping quality/ multi-mappings (adjust to options used)

param.name: inSamBam
param.description: path to mapped paired reads in sam or bam format (recognized by file ending) created by bwa sampe

param.name: outSamBam
param.description: path to write remaining paired reads in sam or bam format (recognized by file ending)

param.name: removeUnmapped
param.description: use this flag to remove pairs with at least one unmapped read

param.name: removeImproperPairs
param.description: use this flag to remove pairs that are not properly paired according to bwa sampe

param.name: removeMapqBelow
param.description: remove all read pairs with at least one mate of mapping quality smaller than minQuality (taken from field "MAPQ" in SAM file), setting the option to 0 deactivates filtering based on mapping quality

param.name: removeMoreThanOptimalHits
param.description: remove all read pairs with more than maxHits optimal alignment positions for at least one mate (based bwa aln specific tag "X0"), setting the option to 0 deactivates filtering based on hit number

var.name: filteredPairs
var.description: path of the sam/bam file with the remaining read pairs (same value as given in parameter outSamBam)
